description: This file defines network data transfer objects (DTOs) and mapping functions to convert network responses into domain models for the post playback rating frontend application. It includes data classes for various network responses such as indices, instruction images, content info, rating settings, and like state, along with helper functions to safely map these to domain models with default values.

classes.name: NetworkIndiceCopy
classes.description: Represents the network response for an index copy, containing title, sections, call-to-action texts, and helper text.

classes.name: NetworkInstructionImages
classes.description: Represents the network response for instruction images, including various image URLs for different UI elements.

classes.name: NetworkContentInfo
classes.description: Represents the network response for content information, including id, title, and poster URL.

classes.name: NetworkVodRatingSettings
classes.description: Represents the network response for video-on-demand rating settings, including display times and rolling credits duration.

classes.name: NetworkLikeState
classes.description: Represents the network response for like state, indicating whether content is liked.

methods.name: NetworkIndiceCopy.toDomainSafe
methods.description: Converts NetworkIndiceCopy to domain IndiceCopy with default fallback values.

methods.name: NetworkInstructionImages.toDomainSafe
methods.description: Converts NetworkInstructionImages to domain InstructionImages with default fallback URLs.

methods.name: NetworkContentInfo.toDomainSafe
methods.description: Converts NetworkContentInfo to domain ContentInfo with default fallback values.

methods.name: NetworkVodRatingSettings.toDomainSafe
methods.description: Converts NetworkVodRatingSettings to domain VodRatingSettings with default fallback values.
